overview: You want to believe it's about shopping, or the kids, or the latest celebrity gossip. You want to believe they sit around, drink tea and talk about gardening. Oh, my friend, prepare for a rude awakening!Here's your chance to be a fly on the wall. It's ladies night out and Stacy and her friends are in rare form. Playing games and sharing things... Things that women only share with each other... Things that would make a sailor blush and a locker room look like a convent. Prepare for the most shocking Ladie's Night Out ever, and consider yourself lucky!
title: Ladies Night Out
